output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)
library(here)

kobe_values <- read_csv(here("data", "kobe_data_complete.csv"))
```

## Tuna 

```{r}
tuna_kobe <- kobe_values %>% 
  filter(tax_grp == 'tuna') %>% 
  select(stock_name, f_msy, b_msy, msy)

ggplot(data = tuna_kobe, aes(x = b_msy, y = f_msy, label = stock_name)) +
  geom_point(aes(size = msy), color = "red") +
  geom_text(hjust = 0.5, vjust = 1.5) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 1,linetype = 2) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 1,linetype = 2) +
  theme_classic() +
  labs(y = "F/Fmsy",
       x = "B/Bmsy")
```
